entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gjoa Haven Airport 10:00 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Temperature: -34.5°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -38.5°C
Wind: NW 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 50 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 32. Wind chill minus 43 in the evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 7:39 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
